general: Content validation ensures your portfolio displays correctly.
Run 'npm run validate' to check all content files.
tags: Tags help visitors filter your work by area of expertise.
Use 'science' for research and scientific work.
Use 'policy' for policy analysis and governance work.
Use 'tech' for technical projects and development work.
You can use multiple tags for interdisciplinary work.
workTypes: Use type: 'project' for software, apps, and technical implementations.
Use type: 'publication' for papers, articles, and research publications.
Projects should include 'technologies' field, publications should include 'journal' field.
images: Images should be placed in src/assets/images/ or src/static/
Use relative paths starting with /assets/images/ or /static/
Include alt text in media.alt for accessibility.
Optimize images before adding them to keep the site fast.
